hospital board game

Shanghai Hospital is a board game through which users can learn the characteristics of good hospitals in Shanghai in an interesting way. Through this game,users can learn the characteristics of good hospitals in Shanghai in an interesting way.The game has 40 levels for users to explore.The level is divided according to the Shanghai districts.In different levels,users can know different districts's hospitals of Shanghai. In the game,players roll six-sided dice to move around the game board.If users reaches the grid which the hospital locates in.He can check out the brief introduction to this hospital.There are also punishments or rewards which will decide the location of users in the board. l worked as a front end developer in this projects.My work includes doing the animation of the game and make the most of pages.
